page.title: 09Great Barton First School
page.content: children, three Mistresses and a Head- master. A PTA was formed to collect money for a swimming pool and this was ready by the time the new School was built. In 1969\70 the School had four teachers and a part-timer and a Head, and remained so until 1983\4 when teachers hours were cut and the School now has 3 teachers,a part-timer & Head. There are 110 chn on roll now.The child ren have packed lunches or hot lunches prepared by 2 cooks in the School Kit. The School has close ties with the Church,the Vicar coming once a week to assembly and to teach the 8-9yr olds. There is a large playground and a field for games. The chn go on to Ixworth or St. James Middle Schools and then to Thurston Upper School. The Headmaster of Great Barton First School is Mr. J. Dawkins.
